participant_1.background:
My rap playlist is my favorite because it reminds me of the struggles I faced and how far I've come.
My previous job was at a local coffee shop, but I quit to pursue my passion for LARPing.
i am obsessed with filming.
I'm not married, but my pets are my family.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.

i can t stand clutter or dust.

i make 30k a year.

content.text: Hi! I'm new to the city and looking for friends to hang out with.
Hi there! I'm always looking for new friends. What are your interests?
I love to film and I'm really into LARPing. I also have a pet dog that I'm obsessed with.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to try LARPing but I've never had the chance. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! You dress up as a character and go on an adventure with other people. It's a great way to meet new people and have some fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm definitely going to have to try it out sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get out of the house and have some fun.
What's your favorite thing to film?
I love filming nature and animals. I think it's so beautiful and I love capturing it on camera.
I love nature too! I love going on hikes and taking pictures of the trees and flowers.
Me too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I'm glad we have something in common! I'm sure we'll get along great.
Me too! I'm looking forward to hanging out with you.
